comment:
Vandu, a girl of many moods - sometimes happy and exited, sometimes angry, sometimes calm, sometimes sleepy but mostly a silent girl. Loved your innocence and your calm attitude. Kya gaati ho yaar! & Dance to jabardast, aye haye!  Btw Bihar kab bula rahi ho?
Wish you the best and stay in touch!
